snippet.title: ATONE: Heart of the Elder Tree - Trailer | An Indie Game from New Zealand
snippet.description:
The new release trailer is here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSEULKNwcyY
The new gameplay trailer is here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w5CIE5F8g8U

ATONE: Heart of the Elder Tree is a story-driven puzzle game inspired by Norse Mythology and set in a 2D world comprised entirely of hand-drawn angular art. Players inherit the journey of a young warrior named Estra, solving complex puzzles and surviving rhythm game battle sequences as she ventures to unveil the truth behind her father’s death. The game is scheduled for release in 2019 exclusive on Apple Arcade.

Music by Luminist and Voiced by Brandon Fague


ATONE 
- Newsletter Sign Up - https://www.atonethegame.com/newsletter-sign-up
- Press Kit - https://www.atonethegame.com/press-kit
- Website - https://www.atonethegame.com

- Twitter - https://twitter.com/Wildboystudios

Luminist: 
- YouTube - https://bit.ly/2LiQHIl
- Twitter - https://twitter.com/luministmusic

Brandon Fague:
- Twitter - https://twitter.com/brandon_or_off

Rebecca Haigh (writer):
- Twitter - https://twitter.com/rebeccahaighdev
.
